name: Super Tattoo Designer Game
description:
"After amazing tattoo maker app now OxoApps present you Tattoo Maker 2. Become a tattoo artist and experiment all your tattoo ideas in real. Ink away all your tattoo design in this tattoo studio.

So lets start playing amazing tattoo design game, in this tattoo maker app you can draw tattoos of your own choice from your amazing tattoo collection, it could a horoscope tattoo, tattoo start etc."
